content: Hi, is there a way to provide useful error messages to guide a potential crate user on required feature combinations that are valid when included in a Cargo.toml file?

My first thought is that the crate maintainer could provide helpful documentation and expand on how the different feature flags should work and can be combined together.
For example, the tokio crate documentation comes to mind
Certainly documentation would be necessary regardless but friendly compile-time error messages would be in-line with the rest of the developer experience in Rust. I'll keep digging around. Thanks!
